website_summaries.verdict: While this tie-dye kit comes with a lot of nice features including the instructional DVD, it may not dye as many shirts as expected.
pros: In addition to including all the necessities to create tie-dyed shirts, including soda ash dye, gloves, and rubber bands, this kit comes with a DVD to guide you through making a variety of patterns
cons: Colors aren't as vibrant as some competing kits, and may fade in the wash. Dye may not be enough to color 15 shirts as indicated

customer_reviews.title: and if you want brilliant color all the way through
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are ok, if more than one person is going to participate, get more gloves. Directions indicate that there is enough dye for 15 shirts, but the rubber bands are small, and if you want brilliant color all the way through, expect to do about 5 shirts in reality. Less if you want to do the one color option.
customer_reviews.author: Eluna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tie-dye kit
customer_reviews.text: This was able to thoroughly dye around 10 shirts, adult smalls/mediums. Colours are beautiful and vibrant, kit was very professional and easy to read. Instructions very thorough. I just wish it had more colours in it, but honestly you can't beat it at this price. Make sure to totally saturate in the dye and leave as loooong as possible!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Branning

customer_reviews.title: Great family gift!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this product! We had enough to make at least 10 shirts and still had some left. Colors are very vibrant, have washed the shirts multiple times now and the colors still appear very vibrant. I’m always the one to read reviews to determine if I’m purchasing or not, so I’m doing my part and writing my review for others. This is a GREAT gift for the family. Super fun for the kids, heck and adults! Instructions were clear. Will plan to stick with jacquard products!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Already used when received
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product before and LOVE it but the one we just received has already been used. I noticed some weird scribbles on the box and then inside many of the items were used. I tried to scan the QR code for the video tutorials but it said it had already been scanned. Disappointed in this as it wasn’t cheap.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Fun and creative
customer_reviews.text: Fun and creative. Got it for my girlfriend and we spent a whole day tying and dying. You will want a big plastic tub and some sandwich bags or grocery bags to soak the garments and jeep them separate but we very fun and rewarding.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Yates

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit that comes with everything needed. Highly recommend over other tie dye kits or brands. Professional quality. Vibrant colors that do not fade with washing. And the dye lasts up to a week so you can continue to use and not waste.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: The colors came out bright and vibrant and stayed even after being washed! It definitely won't dye 15 adult shirts if they are saturated fully, but i would definitely buy it again :)
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Makes A LOT of Shirts
customer_reviews.text: This kit made 20 t-shirts for my elementary school class. We even had extra dye left over. The shirts turned out super vibrant and the process was very easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best brand to buy
customer_reviews.text: Best brand to buy. I tie dye with the whole 5th grade class every year. This brand works the best.
customer_reviews.author: Dalanie Kolakowski

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My family used this dye for our first time dying shirts. Newbies got the hang of it pretty well. And the shirts came out awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Get This
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is super duper awesome and lasts four times as long as Tulip, they should really not even be advertised the same. Jacquard is the way to go for tie dye
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy J.

customer_reviews.title: She LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my friends daughters birthday! She LOVED it!! She told me it was her favorite present! I have been buying this tie dye kit for awhile and have nothing bad to say about it. I have shirts from 4 years ago that are still beautifully dyed! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Packaging came open very upset!
customer_reviews.text: My opened my amazon package to find out that a blue bottle came pierced at the bottom. Blue powder was everywhere staining my hands the inside of the box and everywhere i placed it. I was excited to try this kit and am upset the way to sent to me exspecially because it was 33 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this dye kit!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this kit! I've purchased 3 for myself and others as gifts. The colors turn out vibrant on clothing and it's a fun activity to do with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Spore

customer_reviews.title: Jacquard Tie Dye Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit was great. We have tie dyed many shirts with it. It provides you with all the "stuff" you need, not just the dye. Extra bottles for mixing colors, rubber bands, a plastic tarp, the soda ash. Just Great!
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: ... of my Tulip dyes and even though they were nicely packaged, we didn't get the results we wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: The dye wasn't as bright as some of my Tulip dyes and even though they were nicely packaged, we didn't get the results we wanted from this set.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Gene

customer_reviews.title: Shirts came out great! Very easy and CD instructions were fun to
customer_reviews.text: Shirts came out great! Very easy and CD instructions were fun to watch, but I would have liked written ones in english too to take outside with me. I accidentally ordered tow but am going to keep both for the next round of tie-dye fun!
customer_reviews.author: RCabak

customer_reviews.title: Fun craft for older kids!
customer_reviews.text: Follow instructions with soda ash. Rinse WELL in hot water before you take off the rubber bands. This will give you the nice bright colors! Great craft for an 11yr old.
customer_reviews.author: FishLover

customer_reviews.title: This year I bought this kit and the shirts turned out beautiful even if we did do it pretty last minute ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tie dyed with my physics class for a number of years. This year I bought this kit and the shirts turned out beautiful even if we did do it pretty last minute and rushed. So happy we did used it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Eisenman

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: Made a bunch of pillowcase covers as birthday favors for my daughter's sleepover! If you want bright vibrant colors, wait the full 24 hours. For more of a lite, cotton candy look, wait only 8 hours or so.
customer_reviews.author: Agmaloy

customer_reviews.title: Tie Dye!  Oh Yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Tie Dye! My daughter and her friends love to tie dye! This was great kit to add to our supplies! Tie Dye is just a timeless classic!
customer_reviews.author: SIMMONDS4

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter and she has created some amazing looking shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Chris KaiserTop Contributor: Rock Music

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect as expect..it has 6 colors and the painting materials are great...including the rubbers !
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: The goods are received, I like them very much, the quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Damontay

customer_reviews.title: Nice Colors - Good Informational DVD
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughters birthday party, all the girls had fun designing their tie-dyes. The DVD was a good way to introduce all the girls to the different tie-dye patterns. Good deep colors.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing colors. Easy to use. Colors did not fade after several washes.
customer_reviews.author: Addie F

customer_reviews.title: Bright, lasting, colors.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, permanent, color. Best dye I've found, by far. I purchase this every year for tie-dye at the summer camp I run.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color and staying power when used as directed
customer_reviews.text: The only dye I use!!! Amazing color and staying power when used as directed. Recommend air drying
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Was fun.
customer_reviews.text: all inclusive. Even came with a dvd of instructions. Was fun.
customer_reviews.author: David Broden

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Great directions Only wish we could have ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use Great directions Only wish we could have made one more color! (Kit allows for 3 primary and one secondary color)
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A perfect gift to give a child now that tie-dye shirts are back in style.
customer_reviews.author: Opinionated

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough about this product!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this product! Well thought out kit, easy to use and most importantly fantastic results!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Metzner

customer_reviews.title: While the kit comes with all that is advertised, ...
customer_reviews.text: While the kit comes with all that is advertised, the instructions are not in English. The box says English but the instructions are in 4 different languages, and English isn't one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Archer

customer_reviews.title: some smaller mixing bottles would be nice for mixing colors
customer_reviews.text: some smaller mixing bottles would be nice for mixing colors....this kit only had one extra for mixing. maybe some more rubber bands, but very happy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Knight

customer_reviews.title: I used tie-dye as a method to cover it up and it looks amazing. I get so many complements
customer_reviews.text: I had a black and white patterned maxi dress that a blue ink pen exploded on. I used tie-dye as a method to cover it up and it looks amazing. I get so many compliments. I highly recommend researching dying methods and fabrics ideal for each method, though.
customer_reviews.author: Laurnil

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! I got it for a baby shower
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I got it for a baby shower. We did 10 onesies and 25 burp rags and didn't make it through half of the dye in each bottle.I was worried about running out so I cautioned to go easy on the dye. A couple of the cloth diapers I got for the burp rags weren't fully saturated in dye but they still looked great! I could have left out the warning about going easy on the dye and there still would have been plenty left.
customer_reviews.author: thisdesi

customer_reviews.title: gift for my niece
customer_reviews.text: purchase this for Christmas for my Niece and she loved it. Really Great colors and the CD included was really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: beable2

customer_reviews.title: Fun Product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a Tie Dye kit to do dog t'shirts for my Bark for Life. Because of so much color in this kit, it really did well! The dvd helped us allot as we never did tie dye before. The t'shirts came out really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Caronlade

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Simply did not Include enough rubber bands and only one pair of gloves but everything else worked just fine. Just a fair warning that the kit assumes you'll be tie dying in one go.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: tie dye
customer_reviews.text: enjoyed this kit. Easy to use, kids ranging from 3-7years old. will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: vero

customer_reviews.title: one happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product and delivery being quicker than expected
customer_reviews.author: renee gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: the young girl I got this for, loved it. She was so excited to get it, I wish I had a better review on actual product, but it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry in Florida

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had great experience with this product. I made my first tie dye shirt and it came out AWESOME. I wear my tie dye shirt and people gave me a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: linkzigmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this dye kit!! Have bought 2 from this company and colors are consistent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how well the dies perform because I could not be certain I was using them as recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem with this product was the lack of directions in English. Four different languages were included with helpful diagrams but there were details that you could just not acquire. I don't know how well the dies perform because I could not be certain I was using them as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great results, Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Current art teacher with 20 years experience, this is the best and easiest kit to use. I have tried several methods, and the squeeze applicators make it foolproof for kids. I make tshirts every May with my students. Dvd is helpful, HOWEVER the printed DIRECTIONS WERE ONLY IN SPANISH?!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good for a first timer like me
customer_reviews.text: It was okay. Maybe enough for 6 shirts. This dye doesn't seep well. Good for a first timer like me!
customer_reviews.author: Franny

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy any other product!  Everything you need is in the kit!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for Tie Dye parties. They do a boat load of clothes.. we have such a great time, the colors are set and never fade. We have used this product and the clothing we colored for at least 4 years. Colors are still brilliant and never a problem. We have done sheets, pillow cases, even quilts! (quilts take a lot of dye) Completely thrilled with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E. Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Worst tie dye kit ever. The colors washed out of my cotton socks leaving me with 6 pairs of pastel green socks.
customer_reviews.author: mark phegley

customer_reviews.title: Great for a party! Beautiful shirts.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one kit for a birthday party. I made 10 kids shirts and 10 8" tote bags and had half the dye still left. the shirts (we did swirls) turned out so vibrant and beautiful and everyone was happy. I would recommend this product for a party! I dumped the soda ash, but wish i had stored it so i could use up the rest of the dye.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not meet expectations. The product was said to dye 15 adult shirts. It only worked for 8 children shirts. We then had to leave school and purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Lura Dauer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Only had 3 dyes other bottle was empty very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Angelharp

product_meta.title: Jacquard Tie Dye Kit
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Suitable for all ages, this Tie Dye Kit is a super group activity and a great way to get started with tie dyeing! You supply the shirts and everything else you need is here, including three pre-mixed colors of Procion MX dye—the undisputed king of tie dye. For use on cotton and other natural fabrics or clothing. This kit contains primary colors of pre-measured dye powder (the same dye used by professionals) in convenient applicator bottles. You can mix colors to create additional shades. Also includes soda ash dye fixer, rubber bands, rubber gloves, easy to follow instructions and an extra bottle for mixing secondary or pastel colors. This kit will dye up to 15 adult-size t-shirts. Includes detailed instructions and DVD with a how-to segment included. For ages 3 and up, with adult supervision. For over 30 years, Jacquard has been the leading manufacturer of artist quality textile, mixed media and craft products. Our products include textile paints, dyes, fabric art markers, screen inks and craft kits.
feature_bullets: Create colorful, groovy tie-dye shirts as unique as their creators, with Jacquard's Tie Dye Kit
Suitable for all ages, this kit will tie dye 15 adult-size shirts and makes a fantastic group activity
Contains vinyl gloves, rubber bands, and 1/3 lb. of soda ash dye fixer, plus instructions and how-to DVD
Conforms to ASTM D 4236 and ASTM F 963; For ages 8 and up with adult supervision; Made in USA
For over 30 years, Jacquard has been the leading manufacturer of artist quality textile, mixed media and craft products

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars117 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
